extendedInfo.description: âââ NOW WITH 300+ WORDS âââWhat's the Word (4 pics 1 word) is the most amazing game ever! You're given 4 pics and your goal is to figure out what they have in common. It's a really simple and fun to play game. 4 pics - 1 word. Can you guess the word?What's The Word Features:â¢ 300 levels to playâ¢ Fun words and picsâ¢ More coming soon!So that's it â What's The WORD!!!If you like word games, you'll absolutely love What The Word - 4 pics 1 word! So what are you're waiting for â play now!

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: The game is great and challenging. Would of have if 5 stars but when I did the update it put ads in it. Anyone know what the answer is to lv 137? Plz and thank you.
reviews.author: Joy Yanowsky

reviews.title: painful
reviews.comment: level 137.... got stuck here... everytime i enter the app the available letters change... .wtf?
reviews.author: Vivian Hoy

reviews.title: Cheat
reviews.comment: Sucks when use your coins to get a letter and have to stop the game before thee wword is finished But when you come back to it the letter/s that you use coins to get are no longer in their place in the word and your out of the coins you used to get the letter/s!!!!!!! NEED TO FIX THIS PROBLEM, LETTERS NEED TO STAY IN WORD WHEN USE COINS TO GET THEM.
reviews.author: Vicki Vaught

reviews.comment: Ok game but some pictures don\'t make sense. I understand trying to make it challenging but if it\'s 4 pics, the pics should relate better rather than base it oneself\'s interpretation.
reviews.author: Susan Tram

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great game! But does any one know the answer to level 185? A girl in a light blue tank top with a cow behind her, a cartoonish bunny holding an egg, a seagull, and a (pier?)
reviews.author: Ashley Wilson

reviews.title: Stuck on level 10
reviews.comment: What\'s the answer to level 10...every word I hve tried its not the right one...somebody plzzz help...thanks
reviews.author: Sharon Prater

reviews.title: Ok, no.
reviews.comment: I swer, when i go to the picture it gives me letters then i go back to it later and there new letters. Very disapointed....

reviews.title: challenging!!!
reviews.comment: done with level 300... some words are difficult to guess but successfully finished... nice game ...

reviews.title: Good game, bad update.
reviews.comment: Great game, was really enjoying it till the update which has broken it. Now pics randomly don\'t load which makes it frustrating. Please fix!

reviews.title: 4pics 1word, what\'s the word
reviews.comment: my favorite game fun brain teaser I love it

reviews.title: I like this game
reviews.comment: I like this game its  addicting..the thing I hate is there are too many ads...and get more levels to play for the next update

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.comment: Will you be adding more levels? Because I been waiting for a while.

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Good game to spend your spare time.
reviews.author: Anna T\303\274nde Sz\303\241sz

reviews.title: Stinks
reviews.comment: Unrealistically difficult. Pay for help, but don\'t receive. At least with the other (4 pic 1 word) you can post on Facebook & ask friends. Plus they give you coins to start out w automatically if you need some help... And it actually works! This app needs fixing.

reviews.comment: The letters are GRASTTHI  Been stuck for 2 days

reviews.comment: Guyz help pix are a square watermelon a house wearing a cap a man riding tricycle and a scorpio in a glass of wine

reviews.title: Goog way to pass time but!!!
reviews.comment: Is a good game but im uninstaling because im sick of constantly getting notifcations telling me to play I\'ll decide when or if i want to play

reviews.title: Once good now sick with ads
reviews.comment: I love this game I had gotten really far. After the last update it won\'t open because its stuck on a ad invite to play another free game well this sucks you go to hell alisa casino you go to hell!!!!!
reviews.author: Kenneth Pearson

reviews.title: Not bad....
reviews.comment: It would have been better if there wasn\'t any pop-up ads. But it\'s ok. I would recommend it to everyone. And.. OH YA.. The bad thing is that when you use your coins for an answer and you close the app and go to a different thing and when you go back to this app the answers that you used your coins for are not there any more so that means you wasted your coins for nothing. They should really fix that because it\'s so FRUSTRATING!!!!!
reviews.author: Roy Chemplayil

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: This game is cool but it sucks every time I use My guesses it cost more each round then if you don\'t use bingo early you lose it by the way just click the bingo and go back to the game you will still get points :/
reviews.author: Vivian Gregory
